wikiDescription: Teleports you instantly to the spawn area. Great for regrouping or escaping threats.
Use /sethome to mark your base or safe zone. Return anytime using /home.
Send and accept teleport requests using /tpa and /tpaccept to quickly travel to other players.
Privately message other players using /msg. Only you and the recipient will see the message.
View how many extra hearts you have gained or lost with the Lifesteal system.
Teleports you to your last location after teleporting or death (if allowed on the server).
Transfer money to another player for trading or helping friends.
Links your Minecraft and Discord accounts using DiscordSRV. Grants synced roles and chat integration. Use the code in the #link channel on Discord.
